tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thank you soo much for  taking  great care in fixing  my partial flexible dentures. You always  make sure  I'm  comfortable during  each visit  and explain  in a way that I can understand. I'm  grateful for the  way you  help me keep  my smile  healthy. 
Your  patience  and  kindness  truly  make a difference Dr. Radhika Goel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor provided perfect consultancy, addressing all my concerns with clarity and professionalism. The teeth cleaning service was incredibly gentle, making the entire process comfortable and stress-free.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Radhika provides exceptional dental care with a gentle touch and thorough expertise. Their professionalism instills confidence, and their friendly demeanor puts patients at ease. From routine cleanings to complex procedures, Dr. Radhika ensures every visit is comfortable and informative, making them a trusted choice for dental health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very friendly behaviour and clear explanation of the problem by the doctor and its treatment.Hopefully the problem gets solved.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'd been suffering from frequent cheek bites (every time I'd eat). Dr. Radhika did the bite correction procedure on my teeth. I felt no discomfort during the 5-minute procedure and I haven't had any cheek bites since. What's more, she discovered that one of my teeth had a cavity, something another dentist, whom I'd visited a few weeks earlier, had missed! Dr. Radhika filled the cavity and though I was expecting pain, I felt none. Also the filling material she used matched my tooth so well that when I was asked to check in the mirror, I couldn't tell which tooth had been worked on! It looks and feels absolutely natural. I also liked how she patiently answered all my queries before and after and explained the issues, possible solutions, and future actions in layman's terms and with easy to understand analogies. I liked the Dentotsav clinic as well. Everything on the premises looks neat and clean. The location itself is easy to find, especially on Google Maps. Moreover, the clinic has a very capable and polite staff. I was nervous before I got there but was made to feel comfortable as soon as I reached (Also, realizing that the clinic is equipped with the latest technology tools calmed my nerves further). All in all, it was a very satisfactory and pleasant experience (never thought I'd be using the word 'pleasant' to describe a visit to the dentist! :P). So, based on my visit and treatment, I believe that anyone seeking dental assistance would be in good hands with Dr. Radhika at Dentotsav.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My experience was very good .Doctor is very friendly with patient and her entire treatment procedure is excellent

tags: None
review:
Dr. Radhika has been my dentist for about a decade now and I have not been to any other dentist since being treated by her!

Before Dr. Radhika I had been to 4 other dentists in my life. 

The dentist experience had always left me rather scarred and shaken. But not with Dr. Radhika! She is so good that she even fixed a severe problem tooth which had been painful for about 2 years and for which I had been to so many dentists already!

As a gynecologist myself I can say that she has a fantastic work ethic. As a nervous dental patient I like how she explains everything really calmly and talks me through the procedure with a smile.

In the past I have had 2 completely painless root canals done by her. This time I got treated a for gap between my tooth which was causing food to be constantly stuck there, which led to cavities and toothache at the spot. I also got my broken front tooth fixed.

I guess what I like most about her is that she is able to destress the whole dental experience for me, while being very, very good at what she does.
reply_text:
Thanks Ma'am! It was an honour for us at Dentotsav to be able to serve someone as senior a medical practitioner as you!

It is so nice of you to pen such kind words here. We always aim to have made a meaningful impact in your quality of life and shall always take pride in achieving what we could for you. We must thank you for being an very co-operative patient, considering the multiple procedures that we had to do.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
On Feb 2021, I visited for RCT and 6 fillings for 3-4 sittings with Dr Radhika Goel at her Kasba clinic. Few days after few of the dental fillings started to wear out ******* ** *** *** ******** **** *** she had to redo it. I took utmost precautions after the procedure also.
But since one month from May my RCT tooth and few teeth started paining and when I checked in the mirror closely I saw few of the dental fillings on the lower teeth done by the doctor are all gone and few of the tooth are exposed again. Yesterday I was having serious pain and I visited one nearby dentist *** ** *********** **** ** ******* * **** **** *** *** ***** ******* ** ****** ****** *** *** ******** *** *** **** ******** ****** *** **** *** ******* ******* **** * **** *** ****** ** ** *** * ** **** *** **** ***** ******* **** **** ** *** ****** ****** *** ********* ****** ***** ****** **** *** ****** *** ** ** ** ********* * *** ** ** ******* ********* ******* **** ** *** ***** ******** ** ** *** ***** ***** ** **** *********** **** ** ***** *** *** ***** ********* ***** * ***** * **** ****** ******** *** ******** ********
I will not recommend this doctor to anyone after my horrible experience with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: We often dread visiting a dentist. Mere mention of dentist is so scary, that we prefer taking painkillers than to visit the doctor. I was also in excruciating pain for about 3 weeks. When it became unbearable, I went to Dentotsav. The choice was made on the basis of search made for dentists near my home on Practo.  Ms Radhika V Goel is a doctor who would break all your apprehensions we normally carry about a dentist. She listened to my problems patiently, clarified the position and status of my ailment in a very lucid manner, gave me all available options and then started the treatment. While working on my teeth, she would take care that there is no pain. During the treatment, whenever I had slight pain or whenever I felt uncomforted, I would raise my hand and she would immediately stop. Such is her level of care and empathy. I am seeing her for last one month and have been treated on three tooth. I still have  atleast two sessions left. I have had dramatic relief and things now seems great. Dentotsav is equipped with all modern facilities, machinery and equipments. Almost all teeth related problems are treated here. The clinic is cozy and nicely maintained, with hygiene, cleanliness of top notch. The way one is welcomed with a bottle of packaged drinking water, is amazingly comforting. It may hardly cost anything, but it gives you a warm welcome feeling. I would strongly recommend Dentotsav and Dr Radhika V Goel, for all teeth related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I used to be scared of visiting dentists and have had bad experiences earlier. Dr. Goel changed my perception. Now I cannot think of anyone for my dental issues apart from her. She is calm and patience, both in her work and while dealing with the patients as well. Extremely grateful!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Periodontal Flap Surgery,
review:
I visited doctor Radhika for re-rct treatment.  

I had an infection on tooth no 18. This was the RCT treated tooth which i had around 3 years back. Prior to DR radhika I visited many doctors and they suggested me extraction of the tooth as they were unable to reduce the infection on Rct treated tooth. 

 I visited dr. Radhika and she analyzed my case carefully and suggested me flap surgery followed by re-rct *** *** ********* ****** ** * ******** 

Infection is completely vanished. 
I am writing this review after 4 months of my treatment and i am completely satisfied.  

Thanks Doctor for saving my tooth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Radhika Goel is a very competent and friendly doctor. She is the first dentist that I have consulted in my entire adult life! However Dr. Goel made the whole experience a very pleasant. She took the time to explain each step during her examination and treatment routine. She does not rush through the process and does a very thorough job. I did not feel any pain and discomfort during the entire procedure. 
I would highly recommend Dr. Radhika V Goel to anybody wishing to consult a dentist!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Explained the problem in details. Gave options while giving solutions. Soft spoken and handled pain related issues with care 👍

tags: None
review:
The doctor was very courteous and she explained the various options in detail and helped me take an informed decision about whether I wanted root canal treatment before placing the crown or not. The overall ambience of the clinic is very clean, bright and hygienic and gives the patient a lot of confidence coupled with the warm attitude of the doctor and staff and the way each and every step during the treatment is explained to the patient.

Would definitely recommend this place to family and friends.

tags: None
review:
Been here for a dental procedure, and my experience is really good! Dr Goel is a really great Dentist! She is very welcoming and friendly, and has surely made me realize dental procedures can be accessible and hassle-free. She is really calm and completes her diagnosis and procedures by taking the time it needs and keeping patience with her patients! During procedures, she also explained to me each step, and that is wonderful because it kept me informed on my procedure! Her assistant is also really helpful, and they have been really helpful in scheduling and rescheduling my appointments whenever I couldn't be present due to work. Dr Goel's guidance regarding other procedures has also been helpful. And I'm definitely gonna come back for other procedures as well!
Thanks a lot Dr. Goel and Dentotsav team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Madam is very friendly and knowledgeable. We have recently visited for my 7 years old kid for some teeth and gum issues . I am highly recommending everyone.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr. Goel was very polite and explained everything about the procedures in minute details. She listened to my problems patiently and examined me very carefully before advising me of the various options of treatments. I was so nervous and afraid to get my tooth extracted but after speaking with her I decided to go for it. I would definitely recommend her to anyone with dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Best experience ever. She makes sure the patient is comfortable and makes sure there is minimum pain during treatment. She narrated every step that she was going to perform. Explains in details the pros ,cons and costs without being assertive.
I would definitely  recommend her to everyone especially  those who are scared  of getting a root canal done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Goel explained the entire process to me before doing the procedure. I was extremely nervous and she chatted with me throughout to ease my anxiety. 
She has a steady hand and the extraction didn't hurt at all. She took all necessary steps to make sure there was no pain at all.

tags: None
review: I have been visiting Dr. Goel for quite some time now and as usual was very satisfied with this appointment as well. She explained everything nicely, was very polite like every time. I didn't have to wait. The clinic has moved to a new building which has lift so it couldn't have been better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

*** ** * **** **** *******  The problem, treatment options with their pros and cons were well explained.
I got immediate solution, which helped me a lot as I was travelling at that time and I didn't have time. She resolved my problem only in one sitting.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. R.V. Goel treated me without  any pain which I am always scared for dental treatment. It was completely painless and Doctor Goel always assured that she would stop if I feel any irritation or pain. She explains everything very nicely. I am very happy with her treatment.

I am much more better now. Thanks to Doctor Goel.

Sunetra Dutta

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Radhika is very detail oriented. She explains all problems in adequate details. Ensures that the patient understands all possible options for the remedy and chooses one as per convenience. Discuss the pros and cons and the options in detail. Very friendly and supportive. 

Thank you Madam. It was a hassle free experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I was always nervous about going for RCT treatment but Dr Radhika Goel  explained the entire procedures  in details and  ensured that the whole process was smooth and painless  and most importantly gave me the confidence to go for it and ensured that  I had all my queries answered *** *** ** ** *********  ****** I would recommend  all of them . For my dental issues now I am relieved that I have found the right doctor for all my future  dental issues thanks a lot Doctor for your help

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very well mannered, she will listen to you patiently. she is very clear of what needs to be done and will explain the patient calmly about her strategy to address the issue. Her hands are very steady. she gives confidence and calmness to the patient. I have been suffering from recurring gum infection due to an infected root. She removed 2 caps from my rtc and cleaned the area. i will have to go back 4 more times to get the re rtc done. hope it will fix my issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: she had been quite gentle in approach, explained fully about the procedure, did immediate relief to my condition. Charges are reasonable and most importantly in this difficult covid times I got an emergency root canal. will visit again soon for my next sitting.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had gone to the doctor on an emergency basis with a severe tooth ache of a molar, the entire experience was so professional it is truly commendable. In these difficult times while maintaining all protocol, Dr Goel completed my tooth extraction so well, that, not for a minute was I worried or tense. I would recommend Dr Goel without any hesitation and wish her and Dentosav all the best for the future. Well done and god bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am really very much pleased with the gentle behaviour and systematic treatment rendered by Dr Goel blended with her nice explanation of my specific problem. The overall protection during this covid-19 period was really praise worthy. Only one request: if the charges were a bit less, it would have been more sympathetical to the common patients specially for the senior citizens like us. Thank you doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My past experience in Kolkata got me very scared of dentist.  I was procastinating visiting one until I couldnt do without anymore. I did a lot of research, read a lot of reviews and finally decided to go with Dr Radhika. I am so happy I did, she made me feel so relax, explained everything about the condition of my teeth and the treatment required. She is surely a dentist I would recommend to my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am Dr Radhika's patient for 3 years and I trust her advise completely. Dentotsav clinic is very hygenic and clean and she is also very soft spoken and explains very well the treatment. I get regular scaling, filling, etc all dental treatment done by her only.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited some very good dentist throughout my life but I am yet to come across someone like her, she is certainly the most compassionate and sincere one I have met so far. She not only takes time to explain the situation and solutions but even defines the priorities. I felt that she genuinely tries to help her patient both treatment wise and psychologically. Would certainly go back to her if required.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr Goel is easily the best dentist I have encountered. Her friendly approach puts you at ease immediately. She is extremely patient and takes time to explain every step in detail. She answers all questions and always gives the patient the option to choose.
The clinic is clean and hygienic. Would highly recommend Dr Goel and her team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
This was my 2nd visit.
As always she was extremely courteous and professional.
Took pains to explain each and every procedure she undertook.
She also conducted secondary checks for other possible complications arising out of or causing the problem.
Wonderful experience.
The clinic was spotlessly clean, tidy and well equipped.
The nurse was also well trained and very unobtrusive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Radhika Goel is "Patient First" attitude doctor. She puts patient interests before her own financial interest.

She explained me exactly what I needed to do and she didnt rush in doing that.

She also shows a lot of concerns for her patients which is always a good feeling from a patient perspective.

I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I must say the entire experience was very satisfying. I had visited Kolkata for attending a function and at one night I felt immense pain on my tooth. Unable to sleep entire night and next day being Sunday felt very helpless, finally browsing  through Practo app and seeing all the positive review opted for an appointment with DR R Goel( She is open on weekend as well). Dr Goel showed keen interest  in understanding the root of my issue and explained a layman like me on what treatment needed to be done and I must say it worked magic.Her clinic was very nice and clean and had all the modern equipments , even the front desk lady assistant (apologize for not asking her name) who greeted us was very warmth and friendly. ... A big KUDOS to Dr Goel and her team.👍

tags: None
review: Excellent. Several times visited number of dentist and they advised for RCT, anticipating pain I didn't go through the procedure. Today I visit Dr Goel  and undergone first sitting of RTC and to my great surprise, I have not felt even a bit of pain. whole procedure has been done very smoothly and skillfully.  Thanks a lot to Dr Goel.

tags: None
review: *** ********* *** **** *** she was courteous and very transparent with the kind of treatment required and the expenses to be beared. While giving me a plethora of options to manage the cost, she also tried to align the appointment according to my need. Very well recommended.

tags: None
review: Dr. Radhika Goel was very polite and explained the procedure very patiently and in great detail. I have been her patient for a while now and she has always been very friendly and accessible. This was an urgent appointment and I really appreciate how she agreed to see me even on a holiday like Republic day! Thanks doc! :)

tags: None
review: I was referred to Dr.Goel by another dentist, who recommended her very highly for cosmetic dentistry. I am very happy that it was such a good recommendation. I had not only missing front teeth, but also the other front teeth which were lose. Dr Radhika gave me back a nice smile of myself which I have not seen in a long time. Thanks Dr, you are the best!! :D

tags: None
review: Dr was very patient and gave time for me to adjust. She was very professional and asked about any allergies or past medical records which may affect the diagnoses. Clinic and equipment was sterilized in front of me,very clean and hygienic set up. First time try and satisfied.
reply_text: Hey Shawn. Thanks for your kind words and for sharing your experience! It was wonderful working with you on your dental issues, because with co-operative patients such as yourself, one can work with them, rather than on them, and this makes for a better treatment experience! We look forward to keep you smiling! : )

tags: None
review: She is a very good understanding doctor. I loved the way she diagnose a disease after hearing the patients problem. Treated burning mouth syndrome in effective manner. Still artificial tooth dentures are left for my mother. I strongly recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Good experience. I went in for a general teeth check-up. I was satisfied with the experience with the doctor.

tags: None
context: Scaling / Polishing,Cosmetic Filling,Zirconia Crowns,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I am a very nervous dental patient, but I appreciate how comfortable I felt at Dentotsav Dental Clinic with Dr. Radhika.

Over time I have had a lot of dental work done from her and found her very caring and sweet. I am still somewhat nervous about dental issues, but the fact that my dentist is so good makes it that much easier. As a senior citizen I, along with my husband, make it a point to have annual dental checkup done with Dr. Radhika to prevent any major issues. 

So of course I recommend Dr. Radhika for all dental treatment!

tags: None
context: Zirconia Crowns,Scaling / Polishing,Composite tooth filling,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I have known Dr. Radhika V Goel since 2008. She is one of the most caring, patient and calm doctors I have ever known.

Being a cancer patient, oral health is of utmost importance to me, as any discomfort, if untreated, can quickly blow up to a major issue. I have had various Root Canal treatment and crowns, scaling, etc done by Dr. Radhika. I also get a frequent checkup done every 6 months or so, to keep healthy oral health.

I feel absolutely confident in recommending Dr. Radhika and Dentotsav to my friends.

reply_text: Thanks for your kind words! We sincerely appreciate you sharing your sentiments here as it definitely keeps team Dentotsav pepped up and motivated to try and deliver our best every time. As a satisfied patient, we deeply value your support through the referrals to the clinic. : )

review: The doctor was really patient however the treatment cost is too expensive for this doctor. Its really not affordable for middle class people.
reply_text:
Dear Ma'am,

Sorry as we are to learn that you feel this way, we do appreciate you taking the time to give us this feedback!

Perhaps this rather Rare opinion stems from some sort of a misunderstanding, something for which we are very apologetic!

After all, thousands of patient's, (over more than a decade), couldn't all have been wrong all the time!

Our patients are from the whole cross-section of our society, be they college students, or retired govt. servants, or housewives, or businesspeople, or service personnel. This is obviously something we are deeply proud of!!

We believe in not bargaining with our patient's health and so we do not bargain with the quality of our care.

We also realized early on that the size of one's wallet has nothing to do with how beautiful one's healthy smile is! 

That is why we offer many Zero Interest payment plans, often spanning over several months, to many who are desirous of availing such facilities.

We are greatful you considered us and appreciate your trust in the quality of our care! 🙏

We look forward to seeing your happy smile again!

Regards,
TeamDentotsav🙂
(For Dr. RVG)
